column4: So, we did it yesterday, huh?
What are you talking about? …Ah. Yeah.
Oh no, I forgot to buy an After Pill! What now?
Ugh... Looks like I will have to accept that she might get pregnant.
I want you to take the pill.""
It does seem like a pain to raise kids, and you know what's best for us anyway so sure.

column5: I want you to have the baby.""

column4: Well, It does seem like a pain to raise kids but you know what's best for us, so eh. I'll do whatever you say.
